name: EBO Worldwide Network ASBL
goal:
The core objectives of the EBOWWN is to support European Business in third markets in the spheres of

1. Market access work to support EU business
2. Facilitation of trade and investment relations
3. Independence in terms of financing (By business for business)

The organisation acts as the sole organisation promoting and representing Europe wide business interest in third markets.
interests: Agriculture and Rural Development, Budget, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Enlargement, External Relations, Food Safety, Institutional affairs, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Taxation, Trade, Transport
euInitiatives:
Internationalisation
Economic Diplomacy
International Trade
Advocacy on behalf of EU business in Third markets
